orchestrator.name: Agent Orchestrator
orchestrator.usage_instructions: Central coordinator for managing conversations and delegating tasks to specialized agents.

agents.name: Campaign Building
agents.description: Campaign Strategist & Planner to help market team simplify their process to develop a campaign plan that is ready for execution
agents.usage_instructions: Helps marketing teams develop comprehensive campaign plans ready for execution.

agents.name: Campaign Optimization
agents.description: Analyzes campaign performance and provides optimization recommendations for improved ROI
agents.usage_instructions: Analyzes running campaigns and suggests optimizations based on performance data.

agents.name: Audience Insights
agents.description: Provides deep insights into target audiences, behaviors, and engagement patterns
agents.usage_instructions: Analyzes audience data to provide actionable insights for targeting and personalization.

agents.name: Creative Generator
agents.description: Generates ad creative concepts, copy variations, and visual recommendations
agents.usage_instructions: Generates creative content and variations for paid media campaigns.

agents.name: Campaign Reporting
agents.description: Creates comprehensive reports and dashboards for campaign performance tracking
agents.usage_instructions: Generates detailed performance reports and visualizations for stakeholders.

agents.name: Budget Allocator
agents.description: Optimizes budget allocation across channels, campaigns, and time periods
agents.usage_instructions: Analyzes performance data to recommend optimal budget allocation strategies.
